name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **React**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript** to deliver high-performance, user-centric web applications. My expertise also includes **Next.js** for server-side rendering and building scalable front-end architectures. I am well-versed in testing methodologies including unit testing, integration testing, and E2E testing, ensuring high-quality output and robust user experiences.

I have a solid background in developing secure applications and implementing event-driven architecture, which aligns with best practices in creating responsive and interactive web solutions. My technical acumen extends to utilizing cloud services like **Amazon Web Services (AWS)** to support deployment and scalability. I possess experience with backend technologies that complement my frontend skills, including familiarity with **MySQL** and **gRPC** for efficient data handling and communication.

In addition to my technical skills, I bring an agile mindset and a passion for continuous learning and improvement, enabling my team to adopt innovative solutions that meet client needs in dynamic environments.
